title: Unable to see ranked stats after 7.7 patch

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Can't see ranked stats on my profile or anybody's profiles after Patch 7.7

Also, mouse wheel scroll is disabled on the boards..

replies.body: I saw that i had no ranked stats and thought that season ended  lmao

Morning!  I see these reports and hear you!  Is this still an issue, though?  

I looked at a few profiles and everything looks to be in order.  The stats may have needed a bit to show up as the servers returned from maintenance and setup for patch day.  Let me know guys!
Everything seems to be back in order
Whew.  Glad to hear it, thanks for letting me know!
hey riot ! In this 7.7 patch when i quene and my acc attemps to connect in the game , the laucher chrash so i cant gen in the game ... What should i do ?
having this problem too..... cant even que up for a ranked game{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

Yea it didn't register my ranked games, none of my wins counted into my promos. I've also noticed that at the end game lobby, the game was labelled as classic as in normals however I'm not sure if ranked solo/duo is also considered "classic".
